scripts.dev:marp-watch: concurrently -k -n MARP -c magenta "nodemon --watch slides --ext md --ignore slides/tmp-combined.md --exec 'npm run build:marp'"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n DOCS,MARP -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:docusaurus" "npm run dev:marp-watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:marp && npm run build:docusaurus
